dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, B, have you seen all the noise about this Beverly Hills mansion sale?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, B, have you seen all the noise about this Beverly Hills mansion sale?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, totally, A! Like, New York Times, CNN, everyone's buzzing about Trump's property, saying it was, uh, wildly overpriced.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, totally, A! Like, New York Times, C N N, everyone's buzzing about Trump's property, saying it was, uh, wildly overpriced.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The next day, the Washington Post reported that Hillcrest has ties to Indonesian billionaire Hary Tanoesoedibjo and suggested that the house may have gone for an inflated price. And Thursday night, MSNBC host Rachel Maddow ran a lengthy segment on the deal, asking: Why did someone just radically overpay the president for a property in Los Angeles?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly. Anderson Cooper was even asking, "Why did someone radically overpay the president?" But, like, is that actually what happened?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly. Anderson Cooper was even asking, Why did someone radically overpay the president? But, like, is that actually what happened?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: And Thursday night, MSNBC host Rachel Maddow ran a lengthy segment on the deal, asking: Why did someone just radically overpay the president for a property in Los Angeles?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, that's the thing, isn't it? When you dig a little deeper, it seems, um, not so cut and dry.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, that's the thing, isn't it? When you dig a little deeper, it seems, um, not so cut and dry.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? Forbes actually valued that place at 16 million dollars just a few months ago. And they talked to a bunch of local real estate brokers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? Forbes actually valued that place at sixteen million dollars just a few months ago. And they talked to a bunch of local real estate brokers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In February, Forbes valued the property at $13 million as part of its twice-annual look at the size of Donald Trumps fortune.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, I saw that. And those brokers, they were saying the actual value was anywhere from, like, 13 to 18 million. So, that 13.5 million sale? [interrupts]
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, I saw that. And those brokers, they were saying the actual value was anywhere from, like, thirteen to eighteen million. So, that thirteen point five million sale?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: That estimate, just 4% off the reported sales price, was based on conversations with five local real estate brokers, who suggested the property could be worth anywhere from $11 million to $15 million.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Totally in range! Even the broker with the lowest estimate, Joe Babajian, said it wasn't outrageous.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally in range! Even the broker with the lowest estimate, Joe Babajian, said it wasn't outrageous.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Even the broker who offered the lowest estimate, Joe Babajian of Rodeo Realty, said that $13.5 million was not an outrageous amount of money: Its definitely in the range.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I mean, even another broker, Mitra Sisatar, from Coldwell Banker, said her colleague couldn't even sell it a few months back. But still, 13.5 was fair.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I mean, even another broker, Mitra Sisatar, from Coldwell Banker, said her colleague couldn't even sell it a few months back. But still, thirteen point five was fair.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On Friday, Forbes interviewed a sixth broker, Mitra Sisatar of Coldwell Banker. She said one of her colleagues tried to sell Trumps house a few months ago. He couldnt sell it, or he didnt have enough showings. Even so, Sisatar said, $13.5 million was within the range someone might expect for the property.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, this whole "Trump getting richer off the presidency" narrative, it might be, uh, a bit overblown on the *price* front.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, this whole Trump getting richer off the presidency narrative, it might be, uh, a bit overblown on the price front.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: So despite all the hype, the recent sale is not necessarily an example of Trump getting richer off the presidency.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. I mean, sure, he bought it for 7 million in 2007, and the county assesses it lower, but L.A. real estate, you know, it's a different beast.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. I mean, sure, he bought it for seven million in two thousand seven, and the county assesses it lower, but L A real estate, you know, it's a different beast.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Yes, Trump bought the place for $7 million in 2007. And yes, Los Angeles County assesses it at $8.4 million today.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It really is. Assessed values and market values often just, like, don't align there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really is. Assessed values and market values often just, like, don't align there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: But the market has changed over the last 12 years, and the true values of properties in Los Angeles County often diverge from their assessed values.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But that doesn't mean it's all clean, right? There are still some, um, ethical eyebrows being raised.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But that doesn't mean it's all clean, right? There are still some, um, ethical eyebrows being raised.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: None of which is to say the recent sale is free of ethics concerns.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, for sure. The reported buyer, Jack Ma? He's a Chinese business partner of Trump, with his own political ambitions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, for sure. The reported buyer, Jack Ma? He's a Chinese business partner of Trump, with his own political ambitions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tanoesoedibjo is an Indonesian business partner of Donald Trump, with his own ambitions for political office.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And there's the whole "no new foreign deals" pledge Trump made before his inauguration. If Ma's the buyer, that's, like, a pretty clear violation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And there's the whole no new foreign deals pledge Trump made before his inauguration. If Ma's the buyer, that's, like, a pretty clear violation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Shortly before Trumps inauguration, his lawyer promised no new foreign deals will be made whatsoever during the duration of President Trumps presidency. If Tanoesoedibjo is in fact the buyer, the recent sale would seem to violate Trumps pledge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and some brokers even said there might be a "slight premium" just for the cachet of buying from the president. Like, that's a thing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and some brokers even said there might be a slight premium just for the cachet of buying from the president. Like, that's a thing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Another local broker, Ernie Carswell, agreed: I believe it sold at the slight premium simply because of who the seller was.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which, honestly, wouldn't be the first time. He's had state-owned banks from China and India as tenants, uh, sold a Vegas condo to someone in China.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which, honestly, wouldn't be the first time. He's had state-owned banks from China and India as tenants, uh, sold a Vegas condo to someone in China.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The president has counted state-owned banks from China and India as tenants in two of his buildings. And last year, he even sold a Las Vegas condo to someone with a listed address in Taiyuan City, China.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, while the price itself might have been legit, the surrounding circumstances, you know, that's where it gets really murky.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, while the price itself might have been legit, the surrounding circumstances, you know, that's where it gets really murky.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. A very *L.A.* kind of murky.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. A very L A kind of murky.
